text: The 1st 10 Hours of Messina was a sports car race, held on 24 August 1952 in the street circuit of Messina, Italy. ==Final standings== * Started: 39 * Classified: 23 {| class="wikitable" width=55% style="font-size:90%; text- align:left;" |- !# !!Drivers!!Team!!Average |- | align=center|1 | Clemente Biondetti Franco Cornacchia | Ferrari 212 MM | align=center|98.28 km/h |- | align=center|2 | Carlo Gazzabini Sergio Ferraguti | Ferrari 212 Export | align=center|97.47 km/h |- | align=center|3 | Gianfranco Moroni "W" | Ferrari 2.6 | align=center|93.9 km/h |- | align=center|4 | Garufi Ubbiali | Aurelia B21 | align=center| km/h |- | align=center|5 | Bianca Maria Piazza Mario Piazza | Ferrari | align=center| km/h |- | align=center|5 | Becucci ? | Alfa Romeo 1.9 | align=center| km/h |} ==See also== * Messina Grand Prix (auto race that replaced it) ==References== ==External links== * La 10 Ore di Messina, la storia Category:10 Hours of Messina
title: 1952 10 Hours of Messina
